Projects

Open Source

C# / .NET

  • DynamicBuilder Suspiciously pleasant XML construction API for C# 4, inspired by Ruby’s Builder
  • Nate Simple little fluent state machine for C# that doesn’t have its way with your architecture.
  • ArgumentReflector Spoonful of syntactic C# 3.0 sugar for accepting named, optional, method parameters via anonymous objects.

JavaScript

  • DeLorean Flux capacitor for accurately faking time-bound JavaScript for testing purposes, including complex interactions of timeouts, intervals, and dates.
  • Pavlov Rich, Behavioral, API over QUnit

jQuery

  • jQuery.lifesupport Smart, simple, and secure session management plugin
  • jQuery.safetynet A smarter in-browser “unsaved changes” warning plugin
  • jQuery.autotype Simple, accurate, typing simulation plugin
  • jQuery.netchanger Plugin enabling a rich extension to the DOM onchange event
  • jQuery.flextarea Smart HTML5-aware auto-resizing textarea
  • jQuery.fasten Slightly smarter fixed positioning plugin
  • jQuery.confine Textarea maxlength, Done Right
  • jQuery.updatepanel proxies ASP.NET AJAX client-side events as native jQuery events via the jQuery Special Events API.

Other

  • ColorScrub Simple pure-javascript tool for quickly viewing and sharing a local or remote color palette
  • Monokai-VS Monokai color theme for Visual Studio 2010 and 2008
